Not 100%. Surrenders before any inhib falls can have a team win before getting Super Minions. Should a late game ace cause a throw so hard, that they had taken inhibs while their opponent hadn't and the surrender goes through before they take an inhib, the only team with Super Minions would have been the losing team.

Accoring to lolking he as a 46.02% winrate now.  I really don't think it's in doubt he is in the bottom 10 champs or so in winrate.  He's not the bottom 5, but he's pretty low and much lower than he was before the rework

He's completely fine in low elo. Whenever I play him against silver and bronze players in normal games I carry.

The problem is when you're playing against opponents that realize they shouldn't walk into veigar's stun.

The thing is though, I don't ever use it in lane offensively.  I'll use it to give myself some breathing room if I'm getting zoned and need to CS, but people don't just walk into it at the level I play at (I'm Silver II and a mid main, so my mid is probably like Gold IV or so) in teambuilder.  I only ever use it in teamfights offensively because then there's an actual chance someone will get at least trapped.

Even without idiots walking into my stun I still do fine...

When I first started playing LoL, I thought Veigar WAS a minion. Ah, the days of being an innocent noob...
